announcements.details: Listen to the homily for the 17th Sunday in Ordinary Time by Most Rev John Louis
announcements.title: Homily: 17th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 10th August, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Knights and ladies of Marshall and Friday borns. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 19th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: Wednesday 6th August is the Feast of the Transfiguration of the Lord. Mass will be in the evening at 7pm.
announcements.title: Feast of the Transfiguarion of the Lord

announcements.details: The re-opening date for the St Bakhita marriage school has been postponed. A new date will be announced in due course.
announcements.title: Marriage School

announcements.details: The Novena prayers at the Parish level will begin from Wednesday 6th August - Friday 8th August as well as on Sunday 10th August 2025. Prayers from Wednesday to Friday will begin at 6:30pm.
announcements.title: Deanery Assumption Novena

announcements.details: Registration for UCMAS which is a child brain development programme is ongoing. Kindly register your child for a training in concentration, self-confidence and all-round academic proficiency. Contact 0242146843 to register.
announcements.title: UCMAS Brain Development Programme

masses.details: Rosary prayers begin 30 mins before mass
masses.subtitle: Saturday at 6:30am
masses.title: Saturday Morning Mass

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School opens on 3rd August, 2025.

sacraments.subtitle: Adults: Sunday after first mass; Children: Saturdays at 3pm
